title: President Jimmy Carter: His Prayers from Inside the White House
description: The former U.S. President and Nobel Peace Prize winner discusses how his faith guided him and how his global influence grew after he left the White House.  He also opens up about the secret to his over 70-year marriage to former First Lady Rosalynn. Following this interview, Mr. Carter announced he had been diagnosed with cancer.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
